errors.err: # Error, two parameters are required: year and type.
# Error, year should be a number between 2013 and 2021.
# Error, invalid type. Type should be one of this options: sc, xf, cw, go, mc, enas.
# Error, invalid year for type enas. The only valid year for type enas is 2020.

# Error, invalid year and type. # Year should be a number between 2013 and 2021. # Type should be one of this options: sc, xf, cw, go, mc, enas. # Parameters could be in the wrong order. The first parameter must be year and type must be second one, not otherwise.
